text:
@peltzmadeline @mmfa OH FFS @seanhannity 
“Gov. Greg Abbott expressed regret tonight about the reopening process he spearheaded during the coronavirus pandemic.
“If I could go back and redo anything, it probably would have been to slow down the opening of bars," Abbott said.”

https://t.co/4sSGa1fI4q
